name: Butter Chicken Wraps
description: Stretch leftover Butter Chicken into another meal. Bulk it up with quinoa and spinach for a filling hot sandwich dinner.

ingredients.name: low-fat plain yogurt or light sour cream

preparation: In Round or Multipurpose Steamer, stir Butter Chicken with spinach and quinoa. Microwave on high, stirring occasionally, until warmed through, about 5 min.
Gently warm naan in the microwave, if you wish.
Divide chicken mixture between naan, then roll up. Dish up with yogurt, if you wish.

products.name: Butter Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: There’s something so enjoyable about a big plate of Butter Chicken with warm naan or rice on the side! Our version is quicker than takeout, ready in just 20 minutes in your Round Steamer, and more affordable. Each serving is around $2, and the recipe serves eight—great for a weekend family get-together.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
